tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
  customer_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  date_submitted DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  product_id INT,
  rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE GreenProducts (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR,
  category VARCHAR,
  price DECIMAL,
  eco_friendly BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  customer_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);
